63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Ammar bin Yasir:I saw Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) , and the only converts (to Islam) with him, were five slaves, two women and Abu Bakr

chapter.ara-name: باب إِسْلاَمُ أَبِي بَكْرٍ الصِّدِّيقِ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: The conversion of Abu Bakr رضي الله عنه to Islam
